Sentence.value: These infections are spread by direct contact with a sore on the genitals or mouth, body fluids, or sometimes the skin around the genital area.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: These [[infections|C0021311]] are spread by direct contact with a sore on the [[genitals|C0017420]] or [[mouth|C1278910]], body fluids, or sometimes the skin around the genital area.

Sentence.value: Before having sex: - Get to know your partner and discuss your sexual histories - Don't feel forced into having sex - Don't have sexual contact with anyone but your partner Your sexual partner should be someone who you know does not have any STI.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: Before having sex: - Get to know your partner and discuss your sexual histories - Don't feel forced into having sex - Don't have sexual contact with anyone but your partner Your [[sexual partner|C0036911]] should be someone who you know does not have any [[STI|C0009450]].

Sentence.value: Alcohol and drugs impair your judgment.
